entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for October 10, 2024

summary.caption: “Okay, Pete! Start the pressure nice and easy.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for October 10, 2024

summary.caption: “And here we are last summer going south. … Wait a minute, Irene! We went north last summer! The stupid slide’s in backwards!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for October 10, 2024

summary.caption: “And that goes for Lancelot, Galahad, and the rest of you guys—no more stickin’ your gum under the table.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for October 10, 2024
The Far Side comic 5 for October 10, 2024

summary.caption: “That does it! … I’m going to go up there and give those people hell!”
